segments.text: I was wondering if I could collect unemployment benefits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am still working for now , but I might get laid off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may collect unemployment if you are working fewer hours or got laid off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does everyone who gets laid off get to collect unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , some jobs are exempt from paying into unemployment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can I find out if I can collect ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your employer can tell you if you have been paying into unemployment and now qualify to collect .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How will I know how much I can collect on unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on how much you earned . When you file , they will determine the amount .
segments.speaker: S2
